forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Areas of patchy fog. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
